articles.author: Sophie Rosenthal
articles.title: Veteran burns American flag outside White House hours after executive order banning it - WUSA9
articles.description: Flag burning is protected speech under the First Amendment, according to Supreme Court precedent.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON An Army veteran from North Carolina set an American flag ablaze outside the White House Monday evening, hours after President Donald Trump signed an executive order banning flag burning.
